architecture.description: Options are x64 or arm64. Defaults to x64

Image.description: This object collects the image information used for testing. The associated properties of each image type must be populated.s

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

Job.description: A job is an instance of LISA running the specified test parameters

value.description: The Job items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

JobListResult.description: The response of a Job list operation.

jobTemplateName.description: Job template name. The name or the instance should be provided.

resourceGroupNamePrefix.description: Prefix to use for resource groups that are created during LISA validation.

repos.description: An array of strings that define different package repos to use in tests.

results.description: Test results once job is completed.

JobTemplate.description: A template defining the parameters for a test job.

value.description: The JobTemplate items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

JobTemplateListResult.description: The response of a JobTemplate list operation.

region.description: Azure region to run test in.

vmSize.description: VM sizes to run test on.

selections.description: Test Selections. Default is to run the smoke_test case

customParameters.description: Custom parameters for different test cases

concurrency.description: The number of concurrent environments. Default is 4.

region.description: Azure region to run test in.

vmSize.description: VM sizes to run test on.

selections.description: Test Selections. Default is to run the smoke_test case

customParameters.description: Custom parameters for different test cases

concurrency.description: The number of concurrent environments. Default is 4.

JobTemplateUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the JobTemplate.

JobUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the Job.

jobTemplateName.description: Job template name. The name or the instance should be provided.

resourceGroupNamePrefix.description: Prefix to use for resource groups that are created during LISA validation.

repos.description: An array of strings that define different package repos to use in tests.

JobUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the Job.

caseName.description: Test case name. Default is empty.

caseArea.description: Test case area. Default is empty.

caseCategory.description: Test case category. Default is empty.

casePriority.description: Test case priority. Default is empty and represents all priorities. Valid values are from 0-4

action.description: Action to take. Default is include

useNewEnvironment.description: Use new environment for each test case. Default false

ignoreFailure.description: Ignore failed test cases. Default false

subscriptionId.description: SIG subscription ID - Optional. The default is the current subscription
Shared Image Gallery Subscription - Optional. The default is the current subscription
